R

readHighScores(String) - Method in class pacman.models.ScoreManager
Reads the high scores from csv file into memory.
reset() - Method in class pacman.models.characters.Pacman
Stops Pacman moving, and returns to the original starting position.
reset() - Method in class pacman.models.ScoreManager
Resets the ScoreManager to default values, then updates the text on screen.
resetHighScores() - Method in class pacman.controllers.SetupController
Called when the resetHighScores Button is clicked, and opens a confirmation dialog before clearing high scores.
resetMap() - Method in class pacman.controllers.SetupController
Called when the resetMapButton is clicked, and sets the default built-in map file as the current maze file.
resetMapButton - Variable in class pacman.controllers.SetupController
 
restartGame(KeyEvent) - Method in class pacman.GameManager
Restart the game and reset game state, if the KeyCode of the parameter is ESCAPE.
rightPacmanAnimation - Variable in class pacman.models.characters.Pacman
 
root - Variable in class pacman.controllers.GameController
 
run() - Method in class pacman.models.characters.Ghost
Starts a new thread and begins the Ghost animation on it.
